targets.query: SELECT last("ifOperStatus") AS "Status", last("ifSpeed") AS "Speed", last("ifLastChange") / 100 AS "LastChange", last("ifInErrors") AS "InErrors", last("ifOutErrors") AS "OutErrors", last("ifInOctets") AS "InOctet", last("ifOutOctets") AS "OutOctet", last("ifInDiscards") AS "InDiscards", last("ifOutDiscards") AS "OutDiscards", last("ifAlias") AS "ifAlias" FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ifIndex", "ifDescr", "ifPhysAddress"
SELECT last("sysLocation") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count(distinct("ifInErrors")) FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifInErrors" > 0 AND time >= now() - 10s)
SELECT count(distinct("ifOutErrors")) FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifOutErrors" > 0 AND $timeFilter AND time >= now() - 10s)

SELECT count(distinct("ifOutErrors")) FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifOutErrors" > 0 AND $timeFilter AND time >= now() - 10s)

SELECT last("ifOperStatus") AS "Status", last("ifSpeed") AS "Speed", last("ifLastChange") / 100 AS "LastChange", last("ifInErrors") AS "InErrors", last("ifOutErrors") AS "OutErrors", last("ifInOctets") AS "InOctet", last("ifOutOctets") AS "OutOctet", last("ifInDiscards") AS "InDiscards", last("ifOutDiscards") AS "OutDiscards", last("ifAlias") AS "ifAlias" FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ifIndex", "ifDescr", "ifPhysAddress"
SELECT last("sysLocation") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count(distinct("ifInErrors")) FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifInErrors" > 0 AND time >= now() - 10s)
SELECT count(distinct("ifOutErrors")) FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifOutErrors" > 0 AND $timeFilter AND time >= now() - 10s)

SELECT last("ifOperStatus") AS "Status", last("ifSpeed") AS "Speed", last("ifLastChange") / 100 AS "LastChange", last("ifInErrors") AS "InErrors", last("ifOutErrors") AS "OutErrors", last("ifInOctets") AS "InOctet", last("ifOutOctets") AS "OutOctet", last("ifInDiscards") AS "InDiscards", last("ifOutDiscards") AS "OutDiscards", last("ifAlias") AS "ifAlias" FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "ifIndex", "ifDescr", "ifPhysAddress"
SELECT last("sysLocation") FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/) AND $timeFilter
SELECT count(distinct("ifInErrors")) FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifInErrors" > 0 AND time >= now() - 10s)
SELECT count(distinct("ifOutErrors")) FROM "switch" WHERE ("agent_host" =~ /^$ip$/ AND "ifOutErrors" > 0 AND $timeFilter AND time >= now() - 10s)

list.label: Port
list.name: port
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES on telegraf_switch FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "ifIndex"

list.label: IP Switch
list.name: ip
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES on telegraf_switch FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "agent_host"
list.tagValuesQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM on telegraf_switch "switch" WITH KEY = "agent_host" WHERE entPhysicalName= '$tag'
list.tagsQuery: SHOW TAG VALUES on telegraf_switch FROM "switch" WITH KEY = "entPhysicalName"
